profile-sidebar.lockedListTooltip1: Sorry, your current plan lets you access up to
profile-sidebar.lockedListTooltip2: social accounts at the same time (and any business accounts you’re a team member on as long as the owner is on a Business Plan). We’ll keep these other ones safe and sound until you’re ready to upgrade!

default-page.defaultTitle: Let's get your account set up!

stripe.noNameError: Uh oh, please fill out the cardholder name :)
stripe.noZipError: For extra security, please add the zip code associated with this card
stripe.invalidZipError: Whoops, looks like that zip code doesn't match what your bank has on record - up for trying again?

upgrade-modal.proPlanSocialAccounts: Connect up to 8 social accounts, including Pinterest
upgrade-modal.proPlanFiltering: Get powerful post filtering on your recent posts
upgrade-modal.proPlanCuration: Curate your content with RSS integrations
upgrade-modal.proPlanCalendar: Manage everything at a glance with the Social Media Calendar
upgrade-modal.proPlanMonthlyDescription: Cancel and get a refund any time
upgrade-modal.stayOnFreeCta: Stay on the Free Plan for now

welcome-modal.headline: We've refreshed the look of Buffer
welcome-modal.body1: We've tidied up the look of your Buffer dashboard!
welcome-modal.body2: We've kept your features and all your stuff just as it was but with a cleaner and faster experience.

welcome-paid-modal.headline: We have something for you
welcome-paid-modal.body1: We've been working hard on a much improved version of Buffer.
welcome-paid-modal.body2: Everything you know and love about your current Buffer experience is still there, we've just worked on making a few things easier and improving the speed and performance of your Buffer Dashboard
welcome-paid-modal.body3: Don’t worry, you can switch back anytime you like.
